channel.title: Compile My Server
channel.description:
Uhm if i try to compile my server this show: The device is not ready. Press a button to continue. . .
How do i fix?

item.title: Compile My Server
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Edit your compiler in Notepad. Delete everything that comes up and post the code inside notepad.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile My Server
item.dc:creator: @Beasty_x Beasty_x
item.description:
@Beasty_x wrote:

[quote=“tonypker13, post:2, topic:241536”]Set your variables? O.o
Or try this compiler.

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit [/quote] How do i place that in to my compiler?

Read full topic

item.title: Compile My Server
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Set your variables? O.o
Or try this compiler.

@echo off
if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
"%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Read full topic
